tuv.seg: Ban on smoking in the workplace
Cosc ar chaitheamh tobac sa láthair oibre
Under the Public Health (Tobacco) Acts 2002-2015, smoking is forbidden in enclosed places of work
Faoi na hAchtanna Sláinte Poiblí (Tobac) 2002–2015, tá cosc i bhfeidhm ar chaitheamh tobac i láithreacha oibre iniata
This includes office blocks, various buildings, public houses/bars, restaurants and company vehicles (cars and vans)
San áireamh tá bloic oifigí, foirgnimh éagsúla, tithe tábhairne/beáir, bialanna agus feithiclí comhlachta (carranna agus veaineanna)
There is also a limit on the sale of cigarettes
Tá teorainn le díol toitíní freisin
It is no longer possible to buy a pack of 10 cigarettes
Ní féidir paca 10 toitíní a cheannach
You may only buy packs of 20 cigarettes
Níl ach amháin pacaí 20 toitíní ar díol
The purpose of this ban is to offer protection to employees and the public who are exposed to the harmful and toxic effects of tobacco smoke in the workplace
Is í an aidhm atá leis an gcosc ná cosaint a chur ar fáil d’fhostaithe agus don phobal a bheadh i mbaol thorthaí díobháileacha agus tocsaineacha ghal tobac sa láthair oibre
Smoking has been identified as a major cause of heart disease and a significant contributor to lung cancer
Tá caitheamh tobac aitheanta mar chúis mhóir ghalar croí agus mar rannpháirtí suntasach in ailse scámhóige
You are not allowed to smoke in an enclosed place of work
Níl cead ag éinne tobac a chaitheamh i láthair oibre iniata
While the ban means that smoking is forbidden in many places, there are a few exceptions:
Cé go gciallaíonn an cosc nach féidir tobac a chaitheamh i neart áiteanna, tá cúpla eisceacht ann:
• Police station detention areas
• Áiteanna coinneála i stáisiúin Gharda
• Hotel, guesthouse and B and B bedrooms
• Seomraí codlata in óstáin, i dtithe lóistín agus i dtithe L& B
• Third-level educational residential facilities
• Áiteanna cónaithe in institiúidí oideachais triú leibhéil
Even though certain places are exempt from the ban, all employers (even those who are exempt) still have the right to enforce the legislation
Tá an ceart fós ag fostóirí uilig (fiú iad a bhfuil díolúine acu) an reachtaíocht a chur i bhfeidhm, cé go bhfuil díolúine ag áiteanna áirithe ón gcosc
In other words, even though the above organisations and institutions are not obliged to enforce the ban, they are free to do so if they wish
I bhfocail eile, cé nach bhfuil iachall ar na heagraíochtaí agus na hinstitiúidí thuas an cosc a chur i bhfeidhm, is féidir leo é a dhéanamh más mian leo
Every employer is obliged to protect the health of staff, customers, residents and visitors to their premises
Tá sé de dhualgas ag chuile fostóir sláinte na foirne, na gcustaiméirí, na n-áitritheoirí agus na gcuairteoirí dá (h)áitreabh a chosaint
In the case of exempted buildings only, this means that employers can, if they wish, designate certain areas of their premises as smoking or non-smoking in order to minimise risk
I gcás foirgnimh diolúine amháin, ciallaíonn sé seo go bhfuil an cead ag fostóirí áiteanna ar leith dá n-áitribh a ainmniú mar áit thobac nó áit ina bhfuil cosc ar thobac chun an chontúirt a laghdú

This means, for example, that even though a nursing home is exempt from the smoking ban, the owners of the nursing home could order that residents may only smoke outside or in a designated smoking room

Ciallaíonn sé seo, mar shampla, go bhféadfadh úinéirí teach altranais ordú a chur i bhfeidhm ionas nach bhféadfadh áitritheoirí tobac a chaitheamh ach amháin taobh amuigh den bhfoirgneamh nó i seomra tobac ainmnithe, cé go bhfuil diolúine ón gcosc ag an teach altranais
Given that prisons and places of detention are unique, the law does not apply to these institutions
Ós rud é gur áiteanna sainiúla iad príosúin agus áiteanna coinneála, ní bhaineann an dlí leis na hinstitiúidí seo
Again, however, there is nothing to stop prison authorities from designating these institutions as entirely non-smoking or establish designated smoking rooms if they wish
Arís, afách, is féidir le bainistíocht an phríosúin an institiúid a ainmniú mar áit ina bhfuil cosc iomlán ar thobac nó seomraí tobac a ainmniú más mian leí
While smoking in an enclosed workplace is forbidden, employers have discretion to provide an outdoor smoking area, subject to the requirements of the law
Cé go bhfuil cosc ar thobac i láthair oibre iniata, tá cead ag fostóirí limistéar tobac taobh amuigh a chur ar fáil, ach riachtanais an dlí a chomhlíonadh
The law has defined an outdoor area as:
Is é an sainmhíniú dlíthiúil atá ar limistéar taobh amuigh ná:
• A place or premises, or part of a place or premises, that is wholly uncovered by any roof, fixed or mobile
• Áit, nó áitreabh, nó cuid d'áit nó d'áitreabh, nach bhfuil clúdaithe ar chor ar bith le díon, bíodh sin seasta nó soghluaiste
• An outdoor place or premises that is covered by a roof, so long as not more than 50% of the perimeter (outside) is covered by a wall, windows, gate or similar
• Áit taobh amuigh nó áitreabh atá clúdaithe le díon, chomh fada agus nach bhfuil níos mó ná 50% den imeall (taobh amuigh) clúdaithe le balla, fuinneoga, geata nó a leithéid
The smoking ban also applies to common areas within buildings
Baineann an cosc ar thobac le limistéir choitianta laistigh d'fhoirgnimh chomh maith
This means, for example, that corridors, lobby areas and reception areas of buildings such as apartment blocks and hotels are also covered
Ciallaíonn sé seo, mar shampla, go gclúdaíonn sé conairí, forsheomraí agus limistéir fháilte i bhfoirgnimh cosúil le bloic árasán agus óstáin chomh maith

If you wish to make a complaint about smoking in a common area of an apartment block, you should first contact the management company or residents' association of the apartment block and try to reach an agreeable solution

Má tá tú ag iarraidh gearán a dhéanamh faoi chaitheamh tobac i limistéar coitianta i mbloc árasán, ba cheart duit dul i dteagmháil sa chéad áit leis an gcomhlacht bainistíochta/cumann áitritheoirí chun iarracht a dhéanamh teacht ar réiteach
If you wish to make a complaint about smoking in a hotel common area, you should first make your complaint to the hotel management
Má tá tú ag iarraidh gearán a dhéanamh faoi chaitheamh tobac i limistéar coitianta in óstán, ba cheart duit do ghearán a dhéanamh ar dtús do bhainistíocht an óstáin
Remember, it is an offence to smoke in an area that has been designated non-smoking
Meabhraigh: is coir í tobac a chaitheamh i limistéar atá ainmnithe mar áit ina bhfuil "cosc ar thobac"
If your complaint about smoking in a common area of a building has not been resolved, you should contact your local Environmental Health Officer – see 'Where to apply' below

Munar tháinig réiteach ar do ghearán maidir le caitheamh tobac i limistéar coitianta d'fhoirgneamh, d'fhéadfá glaoch a chur ar d'Oifigeach Sláinte Áitiúil - féach 'Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas' thíos
Does my employer have to give me time off work for smoking breaks?
An gcaithfidh m'fhostóir am saor ón obair a thabhairt dom le haghaidh sosanna tobac?
Employees are only entitled to time off work for breaks as set down in Section 12 of the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997
Níl fostaithe i dteideal am saor ón obair le haghaidh sosanna ach amháin mar atá leagtha síos in Alt 12 den Acht um Eagrú Ama Oibre 1997
Your employer is not obliged to provide smoking breaks for employees
Níl iachall ar do fhostóir sosanna tobac a chur ar fáil d’fhostaithe nuair a chuirfear an cosc ar thobac sa láthair oibre i bhfeidhm
Enforcement of the smoking ban
Cur i bhfeidhm an choisc ar thobac
Inspections to ensure that the ban is being implemented are undertaken by Environmental Health Officers employed by the Health Service Executive (HSE)
Tá Oifigigh Shláinte Comhshaoil ó Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) ag déanamh cigireachta chun cinntiú go bhfuil an cosc ar thobac sa láthair oibre á chur i bhfeidhm
In addition, inspections are carried out by inspectors from the Health and Safety Authority
Chomh maith leis sin, tá cigirí ón Údarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta ag déanamh cigireachta
The workplace locations visited by the Health and Safety Authority must comply with the smoke-free measures as part of their general compliance with health and safety requirements

Tá ar na láithreacha oibre a ndéanann an tÚdarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta cuairt orthu na riachtanais an choisc ar thobac a chomhlíonadh mar chuid dá gcomhlíonadh ginearálta ar riachtanais shláinte agus sábháilteachta
Officers from the HSE work to ensure that smoke-free measures are implemented in workplaces connected with the food and hospitality sector
Déanann oifigigh ón FSS cinnte go bhfuil riachtanais an choisc ar thobac á gcur i bhfeidhm i láithreacha oibre sa rannóg bia agus fáilte
Any person found guilty of breaching the ban on smoking in the workplace may be subject to a Class B fine
D’fhéadfaí fíneáil Aicme B a ghearradh ar aon duine a fhaightear ciontach i leith sáraithe an choisc ar thobac sa láthair oibre
The owner, manager or person in charge of the workplace is legally responsible for ensuring that the ban on smoking in the workplace is complied with
Is é an t-úinéir, an bainisteoir nó an duine atá i gceannas ar an láthair oibre atá freagrach go dlíthiúil as a chinntiú go gcomhlíontar an cosc ar thobac sa láthair oibre
You can read information about tobacco control (pdf), guidelines for employers (pdf) and for the licensed trade (pdf)
Tá faisnéis faoi rialú tobac (pdf), treoir le haghaidh fostóirí (pdf) agus treoir don lucht trádála ceadúnaithe (pdf)
Contact your local Environmental Health Officer
Déan teagmháil le d'Oifigeach Sláinte Chomhshaoil áitiúil
